Function Summary
public boolean endsWith (String other)
This method checks if this string ends with given string as parameter
public String format (String... args)
Replace this string {0},{1},{2}... tokens (variables) with passed arguments. {0} corresponds to first argument, {1} to second, etc.
public boolean include ( anotherString)
This method checks if given string is included in this string
public boolean startsWith (String other)
This method checks if this string starts with given string as parameter
public String trim()
Removes all whitespace from start and end of this string

Function Details

function endsWith

public boolean endsWith(String other)
This method checks if this string ends with given string as parameter
Parameters:
other - string to check if this string ends with
Returns:
true if this string ends with given string

function format

public String format(String... args)
Replace this string {0},{1},{2}... tokens (variables) with passed arguments. {0} corresponds to first argument, {1} to second, etc. 
 "This is a {0} string using the {1} method".format("formatted", "inline")
 //will return: "This is a formatted string using the inline method"
Parameters:
args - variable number of arguments to act as variables into the string format
Returns:
formatted string as described above

function include

public boolean include( anotherString)
This method checks if given string is included in this string
Parameters:
anotherString {String} - check if it is contained in this string instance
Returns:
true if given string is included in this string

function startsWith

public boolean startsWith(String other)
This method checks if this string starts with given string as parameter
Parameters:
other - string to check if this string starts with
Returns:
true if this string starts with given string

function trim

public String trim()
Removes all whitespace from start and end of this string
Returns:
new string with all whiteshapce removed from the start and end of this string
